dialogue.name: Why are you working for the Dragonlord

dialogue: Hm? Got a death wish, human?
If you're looking for somewhere to die, go throw yourself at the fusions. They're always itching for a fight.
Piss off, before I break you and your friend there.
Pays well enough. And It's not like I have much else doing.

dialogue.name: How much is he paying you?

dialogue: A knowing grin slides across his face.
Tell you what dear, the fusions here seem right ready to pound me when I least expect it.
You can have my services for 500 yen, and nothing less.
